segments.text: I see a woman in the kitchen, so focused on drying her plate that she doesn’t notice the water pouring over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is growing, and I can’t help but feel a bit anxious about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost surreal how calm everything outside looks through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the way the light falls on the countertop, highlighting the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks determined yet reckless; I can't believe he doesn't see the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How is she not aware of what’s happening right behind her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s excitement as she reaches for the cookie jar is sweet, but it only adds to the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR
